ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Jules Allard ** ANNUITY **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JULES ALLARD, a Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Quebec, in and for the Province of Quebec, effective August 20 2015.
